authors: La Regina G, Bai R, Rensen W, Coluccia A, Piscitelli F, Gatti V, Bolognesi A, Lavecchia A, Granata I, Porta A, Maresca B, Soriani A, Iannitto ML, Mariani M, Santoni A, Brancale A, Ferlini C, Dondio G, Varasi M, Mercurio C, Hamel E, Lavia P, Novellino E, Silvestri R. 2011.
title: Design and synthesis of 2-heterocyclyl-3-arylthio-1H-indoles as potent tubulin polymerization and cell growth inhibitors with improved metabolic stability.
